title: Process an In-Store Exchange
description: A customer wants to exchange a shirt they bought for a different size.

tasks.description: Process the original shirt as a return, using the receipt to look up the transaction.
tasks.expected_outcome: The original item is returned into the system.

tasks.description: Scan the new shirt (the different size) as a new purchase.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new item is added to the transaction.

tasks.description: The POS system calculates an even exchange with a $0 balance. Complete the transaction.
tasks.expected_outcome: The exchange is completed successfully with no money changing hands.
